# f5xc_virtual_site (Data Source)

Fetches information about an existing Virtual Site in F5 Distributed Cloud.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the Virtual Site to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the Virtual Site exists.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the Virtual Site.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the Virtual Site.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels applied to the Virtual Site.
